name: lplamp
description: LPlamp - LP/HP Builder with AI and GitHub Integration

scripts.start: npm run start:backend & npm run start:frontend
scripts.start:local: cd backend && npm run dev:local & cd frontend && npm run dev:local
scripts.build: cd backend && npm run build && cd ../frontend && npm run build
scripts.lint: cd backend && npm run lint && cd ../frontend && npm run lint
scripts.codespaces:health: npm run health:backend && npm run health:frontend

author: LPlamp Team
